sense.gloss: understanding, comprehension, grasp, perception, appreciation, mastery (of an art or skill)

sdata.j: ↑人生↑↓じんせい↓の↑後半↑↓こうはん↓というのは、ただ↑前半↑↓ぜんはん↓に|↑会得|↑↓えとく↓した↑習慣↑↓しゅうかん↓だけで↑成↑↓な↓り↑立↑↓た↓っているのさ。
sdata.e: The second half of a man's life is made up of nothing but the habits he has acquired during the first half.

sdata.j: ↑外国↑↓がいこく↓↑語↑↓ご↓を|↑会得|↑↓えとく↓するのに、↑独習↑↓どくしゅう↓は↑無理↑↓むり↓だと↑思↑↓おも↓います。
sdata.e: I think that it is impossible to master a foreign language by self-learning.

sdata.j: ↑外国↑↓がいこく↓↑語↑↓ご↓を|↑会得|↑↓えとく↓するのに、↑独学↑↓どくがく↓は↑無理↑↓むり↓だと↑思↑↓おも↓います。
sdata.e: I think that it is impossible to master a foreign language by self-learning.
